title: U.S. ignored warnings about Houthi threat, senior Yemeni leader says
description: The U.S. was warned about the dangers Houthi rebels posed before Israel’s war with Hamas but “they didn’t do anything,” a senior politician in Yemen said.

title: Fredrick X brings in new era of Danish royalty with Australian-born queen
description: Fredrick X became the new king of Denmark following his mother’s abdication of the throne, bringing in a new era of royalty and his wife Mary as the first Australian-born queen. NBC News’ Meagan Fitzgerald details the king’s life and bringing two countries from two sides of the world together.

title: Cracked window in Boeing aircraft's cockpit forces All Nippon Airways flight to return
description: An All Nippon Airways flight that departed from Sapporo's New Chitose Airport in Japan on Saturday returned after a crack was discovered in the cockpit window of a Boeing aircraft, the airline said.

title: Volcano erupts in Iceland, spewing lava toward a nearby settlement
description: A volcano erupted in southwestern Iceland sending molten lava toward the nearby village of Grindavik. The residents were evacuated for the second time since November after a series of earthquakes caused fissures in the earth.

title: Israel-Hamas war reaches grim milestone of 100 days
description: The Israel-Hamas war has reached the grim milestone of 100 days of fighting. It is now the longest war between Israel and Palestinians since Israel’s founding 75 years ago. NBC News’ Josh Lederman reports.

title: Volcano erupts in Iceland, forcing residents of town to evacuate
description: A volcano in Iceland’s southwest opened two cracks in the earth, sending rivers of lava creeping toward a small town just 30 miles from the capital. The town’s residents were evacuated overnight. NBC News’ Matt Bradley has the latest.
